g.phishy_message: Link expanded to plain text; beware of a potential phishing attempt

the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: A primeira regra de %(APP_NAME)s é: Não percas a tua senha.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: A segunda regra de %(APP_NAME)s é: Não percas a tua senha.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: A terceira regra do %(APP_NAME)s é: não podemos recuperar sua senha.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: A quarta regra: Se podes te recordar da senha, ela não é segura.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: A quinta regra: Usar apenas senhas geradas aleatoriamente.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: A sexta regra: não diga a ninguém a sua senha.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: A sétima regra: Ter sempre uma cópia de segurança da sua senha.

g.backup_password_by_storing_it: Tenha uma cópia de segurança guardada na sua carteira de senhas ou em um arquivo de texto
g.enter_account_show_password: Introduza um nome de conta correto para mostrar a senha
g.understand_that_APP_NAME_cannot_recover_: Entendo que %(APP_NAME)s não pode recuperar senhas perdidas
g.i_saved_password: Eu guardei com segurança a minha senha gerada
g.password_must_be_characters_or_more: A senha tem de ter %(amount)s caracteres ou mais
g.need_password_or_key: Necessitas uma senha ou chave privada (não uma chave pública)
g.username_does_not_exist: O nome de usuário não existe
g.account_name_should_start_with_a_letter: O nome de usuário deve começar com uma letra.
g.account_name_should_be_shorter: O nome de usuário deve ser mais curto.
g.account_name_should_be_longer: O nome de usuário deve ser mais comprido.
g.account_name_should_have_only_letters_di: O nome de usuário deve ter apenas letras, dígitos, pontos ou hífenes.
g.cannot_increase_reward_of_post_within_th: Não se pode aumentar a recompensa de uma publicação dentro do último minuto antes do pagamento
g.vote_currently_exists_user_must_be_indic: vote currently exists, user must be indicate a desire to reject witness
g.only_one_APP_NAME_account_allowed_per_ip: Only one Steem account allowed per IP address every 10 minutes
g.remember_voting_and_posting_key: Recorda a chave de voto e publicação
g.thank_you_for_being_an_early_visitor_to_: Obrigado por ser um dos primeiros a entrar em %(APP_NAME)s. Entraremos em contacto o mais rápido possível.
g.sorry_your_reddit_account_doesnt_have_en: Desculpa, mas a tua conta Reddit não tem suficiente Karma para um registo grátis. Por favor, adicione o seu endereço eletrónico para entrar na lista de espera
g.or_click_the_button_below_to_register_wi: Ou clica no botão abaixo para te registares com o Facebook
g.please_email_questions_to: Por favor, envia um email com as tuas dúvidas a

next_7_strings_single_block.authors_get_paid_when_people_like_you_up: Autores são pagos quando gente como tu vota nos seus posts
next_7_strings_single_block.if_you_enjoyed_what_you_read_earn_amount: Se gostaste do que leste aqui, cria uma conta hoje mesmo e começa a ganhar STEEM!

g.read_only_mode: Devido a tarefas de manutenção dos servidores, só modo leitura está disponível. Desculpamos a inconveniência.

post_key_warning.confirm: You are about to publish a STEEM private key or master password. You will probably lose control of the associated account and all its funds.
post_key_warning.warning: Legitimate users, including employees of Steemit Inc., will never ask you for a private key or master password.

navigation.intro_paragraph: A tua voz tem valor. Junta-te á comunidade que te paga para publicar e votar conteúdo de alta qualidade.

reply_editor.use_limited_amount_of_tags: Tens %(tagsLength)s tags totais%(includingCategory)s. Por favor usa apenas 5 tags na tua publicação e na linha de categorias.
reply_editor.are_you_sure_you_want_to_clear_this_form: Estás seguro de que queres limpar este formulário?
reply_editor.check_this_to_auto_upvote_your_post: Check this to auto-upvote your post
reply_editor.title: Title

category_selector_jsx.tag_your_story: Tag (up to 5 tags), the first tag is your main category.
category_selector_jsx.use_only_allowed_characters: Use only lowercase letters, digits and one dash
category_selector_jsx.must_end_with_a_letter_or_number: Must end with a letter or number

postfull_jsx.this_post_is_not_available_due_to_a_copy: This post is not available due to a copyright claim.
postfull_jsx.you_are_viewing_a_single_comments_thread: You are viewing a single comment's thread from

market_jsx.price_warning_above: This price is well above the current market price of %(marketPrice)s, are you sure?
market_jsx.price_warning_below: This price is well below the current market price of %(marketPrice)s, are you sure?

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.unable_to_recover_account_not_change_own: We are unable to recover this account, it has not changed ownership recently.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.password_not_used_in_last_days: This password was not used on this account in the last 30 days.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.request_already_submitted_contact_suppor: Your request has been already submitted and we are working on it. Please contact %(SUPPORT_EMAIL)s for the status of your request.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on %(APP_URL)s if the account owner had previously listed '%(APP_NAME)s' as their account trustee and complied with %(APP_NAME)s's Terms of Service.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_facebook_or_reddit_media_to_v: Please login with Facebook or Reddit to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_social_media_to_verify_identi: Please login with %(provider)s to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.enter_email_toverify_identity: We need to verify your identity. Please enter your email address below to begin the verification.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.thanks_for_submitting_request_for_accoun: Thanks for submitting your request for Account Recovery using %(APP_NAME)s's blockchain-based multi factor authentication. We will respond to you as quickly as possible, however, please expect there may be some delay in response due to high volume of emails. Please be prepared to verify your identity.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.cant_confirm_account_ownership: We can't confirm account ownership. Check your password
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.account_recovery_request_not_confirmed: Account recovery request is not confirmed yet, please get back later, thank you for your patience.

user_profile.user_hasnt_made_any_posts_yet: Looks like %(name)s hasn't made any posts yet!
user_profile.user_hasnt_started_bloggin_yet: Looks like %(name)s hasn't started blogging yet!
user_profile.user_hasnt_followed_anything_yet: Looks like %(name)s might not be following anyone yet! If %(name)s recently added new users to follow, their personalized feed will populate once new content is available.
user_profile.looks_like_you_havent_posted_anything_ye: Looks like you haven't posted anything yet.
user_profile.this_is_users_reputations_score_it_is_ba:
This is %(name)s's reputation score.

The reputation score is based on the history of votes received by the account, and is used to hide low quality content.

post_jsx.now_showing_comments_with_low_ratings: Now showing comments with low ratings
post_jsx.comments_were_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: Comments were hidden due to low ratings

voting_jsx.flagging_post_can_remove_rewards_the_fla: Flagging a post can remove rewards and make this material less visible. Some common reasons to flag
voting_jsx.we_will_reset_curation_rewards_for_this_: will reset your curation rewards for this post

witnesses_jsx.you_can_vote_for_maximum_of_witnesses: You can vote for a maximum of 30 witnesses
witnesses_jsx.if_you_want_to_vote_outside_of_top_enter: If you would like to vote for a witness outside of the top 50, enter the account name below to cast a vote
witnesses_jsx.set_witness_proxy: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses_jsx.witness_set: You have set a voting proxy. If you would like to re-enable manual voting, please clear your proxy.

votesandcomments_jsx.no_responses_yet_click_to_respond: No responses yet. Click to respond.

userkeys_jsx.posting_key_is_required_it_should_be_dif: The posting key is used for posting and voting. It should be different from the active and owner keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_active_key_is_used_to_make_transfers: The active key is used to make transfers and place orders in the internal market.
userkeys_jsx.the_owner_key_is_required_to_change_othe: The owner key is the master key for the account and is required to change the other keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_private_key_or_password_should_be_ke: The private key or password for the owner key should be kept offline as much as possible.
userkeys_jsx.the_memo_key_is_used_to_create_and_read_: The memo key is used to create and read memos.

suggestpassword_jsx.APP_NAME_cannot_recover_passwords_keep_t: %(APP_NAME)s cannot recover passwords. Keep this page in a secure location, such as a fireproof safe or safety deposit box.
suggestpassword_jsx.after_printing_write_down_your_user_name: After printing, write down your user name

converttosteem_jsx.your_existing_DEBT_TOKEN_are_liquid_and_: Your existing %(DEBT_TOKEN)s are liquid and transferable. Instead you may wish to trade %(DEBT_TOKEN)s directly in this site under %(link)s or transfer to an external market.
converttosteem_jsx.this_is_a_price_feed_conversion: This is a price feed conversion. The 3.5 day delay is necessary to prevent abuse from gaming the price feed average
converttosteem_jsx.DEBT_TOKEN_will_be_unavailable: This action will take place 3.5 days from now and can not be canceled. These %(DEBT_TOKEN)s will immediately become unavailable

tips_js.liquid_token:
Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s can be converted to %(VESTING_TOKEN)s in a process called powering up.
tips_js.influence_token: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards.
tips_js.estimated_value: The estimated value is based on an average value of %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s in US dollars.
tips_js.non_transferable: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s is non-transferable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.part_of_your_steem_power_is_currently_de: Part of %(user_name)s's STEEM POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on steemit. Your delegation amount can fluctuate.

promote_post_jsx.spend_your_DEBT_TOKEN_to_advertise_this_: Spend your %(DEBT_TOKEN)s's to advertise this post in the promoted content section
promote_post_jsx.this_post_was_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: This post was hidden due to low ratings

about_jsx.about_app_details: %(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content. It leverages a robust digital points system, called Steem, that supports real value for digital rewards through market price discovery and liquidity.

markdownviewer_jsx.images_were_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: Images were hidden due to low ratings.

posts_index.empty_feed_1: Looks like you haven't followed anything yet
posts_index.empty_feed_2: If you recently added new users to follow, your personalized feed will populate once new content is available

loginform_jsx.unable_to_log_you_in: We will be unable to log you in with this browser.
loginform_jsx.are_well_tested_and_known_to_work_with: are well tested and known to work with %(APP_URL)s.
loginform_jsx.due_to_server_maintenance: Due to server maintenance we are running in read only mode. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

loginform_jsx.however_you_can_use_it_to: However, you can use it to

loginform_jsx.you_may_use_this_active_key_on_other_mor: You may use this active key on other more secure pages like the Wallet or Market pages.

loginform_jsx.you_account_has_been_successfully_recove: You account has been successfully recovered!
loginform_jsx.password_update_succes: The password for %(accountName)s was successfully updated
loginform_jsx.password_info: This password or private key was entered incorrectly.  There is probably a handwriting or data-entry error.  Hint: A password or private key generated by Steemit will never contain 0 (zero), O (capital o), I (capital i) and l (lower case L) characters.
loginform_jsx.this_operation_requires_your_key_or_mast: This operation requires your %(authType)s key or Master password.
